name: Ring of Strength
description: A magical ring that enhances the wearer's strength.
looks: The ring is made of shimmering silver and has a large emerald set in the center.

special_effects.strength_boost: Increases the wearer's strength by 10 points.

name: Dagger of Shadows
description: A stealthy dagger that blends into the shadows.
looks: The dagger has a sleek black blade and a hilt wrapped in dark leather. Its surface seems to absorb light, making it hard to see in the dark.

special_effects.shadow_strike: Allows the wielder to perform a stealthy attack from the shadows, dealing bonus damage.

name: Book of Knowledge
description: A mystical book imbued with ancient knowledge and wisdom.
looks: The book has a leather-bound cover with intricate designs and symbols etched into it. The pages are made of parchment and glow with a soft, ethereal light.

special_effects.knowledge_absorption: Allows the user to gain additional experience points from learning and studying.

name: Emerald Ring
description: A beautiful ring adorned with a large emerald gemstone.
looks: The ring is made of silver and features intricate engravings along the band. The emerald gemstone is faceted and catches the light, creating a dazzling display of green hues.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Robe of the Magi
description: A mystical robe that enhances the wearer's magical abilities.
looks: The robe is made of flowing blue silk, adorned with golden thread and intricate runic symbols. It emits a gentle glow.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the damage of spells by 20%.

name: Enchanted Necklace
description: A magical necklace with protective enchantments.
looks: The necklace is made of silver and adorned with small gemstones that emit a soft glow.

special_effects.protection: Provides additional defense against physical attacks.

name: Wand of Healing
description: A magical wand that channels healing energy.
looks: The wand is made of polished wood and emits a gentle white glow. It is adorned with intricate carvings of healing symbols.

special_effects.healing_focus: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and abilities.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that harnesses the power of the elements.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood with intricate engravings representing the different elements. Each engraved element glows with a different color.

special_effects.elemental_burst: 20% chance to release a burst of elemental energy upon successful spell cast.
